Package org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.costs

Class DefaultLoadEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.costs.LoadEstimator
      • org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.costs.DefaultLoadEstimator
  • public class DefaultLoadEstimator
extends LoadEstimator
    Implementation of LoadEstimator that uses a single-point cost function.

      • createIOLinearEstimator

        public static LoadEstimator createIOLinearEstimator​(long loadPerCardinalityUnit,
                                                    double confidence)
        Create a fallback LoadEstimator that accounts a given load for each input and output element.
        Parameters:
        loadPerCardinalityUnit - expected load units per input and output data quantum
        confidence - confidence in the new instance

      • createIOLinearEstimator

        public static LoadEstimator createIOLinearEstimator​(ExecutionOperator operator,
                                                    long loadPerCardinalityUnit,
                                                    double confidence)
        Create a LoadEstimator that accounts a given load for each input and output element. Missing CardinalityEstimates are interpreted as a cardinality of 0.
        Parameters:
        operator - an ExecutionOperator being addressed by the new instance
        loadPerCardinalityUnit - expected load units per input and output data quantum
        confidence - confidence in the new instance

      • createIOLinearEstimator

        public static LoadEstimator createIOLinearEstimator​(ExecutionOperator operator,
                                                    long loadPerCardinalityUnit,
                                                    double confidence,
                                                    CardinalityEstimate nullCardinalityReplacement)
        Create a LoadEstimator that accounts a given load for each input and output element. Missing CardinalityEstimates are interpreted as a cardinality of 0.
        Parameters:
        operator - an ExecutionOperator being addressed by the new instance
        loadPerCardinalityUnit - expected load units per input and output data quantum
        confidence - confidence in the new instance
        nullCardinalityReplacement - replacement for nulls as CardinalityEstimates
